I delighted in investigating the facts relating to the actual world, she busied herself in <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>following the aerial creations of the poets.– The world was to me a secret which I desired to disco-ver,–to her it was a <del loc="c56-0011__left_margin__d1e186__Start"/>haven<del loc="c56-0011__left_margin__d1e186__End"/> vacancy which she sought to people with imaginations of her own.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0011__main__16"/><del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e195__Start"/>When I<del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e195__End"/><del a friend <del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e210__Start"/>who<del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e210__End"/><del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e213__Start"/>who<del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e213__End"/> in one of my school <lb n="c56-0011__main__19"/> fellows who compensated for this. deficiency. remember <lb n="c56-0011__main__24"/> when he was only nine years old he <lb n="c56-0011__main__25"/> wrote a fairy tale which was the <lb n="c56-0011__main__26"/> delight and amazement of all his <lb n="c56-0011__main__27"/> companions. <del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e266__Start"/>Like Don Quixote<del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e266__End"/> his <lb n="c56-0011__main__28"/> favourite study <del very young, I canremember that we used to <lb n="c56-0011__main__30"/> act plays composed by him out of <lb n="c56-0011__main__31"/> th<mdel>is</mdel>ese<del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e306__Start"/>favourite<del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e306__End"/> books, the principal <lb n="c56-0011__main__32"/><del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e311__Start"/>car<del loc="c56-0011__main__d1e311__End"/>characters of which were Orlando <lb n="c56-0011__main__33"/> Robin Hood, Amadis and St. George– <lb n="c56-0011__main__34"/> No youth could could be more happy<lb n="c56-0012__main__1"/> than mine. – <del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e327__Start"/>Our<del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e327__End"/>My parents were indul<lb n="c56-0012__main__2"/>gent, and my companions amiable. <lb n="c56-0012__main__3"/><del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e342__Start"/>and our stud<del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e342__End"/> Our studies were never <lb n="c56-0012__main__4"/> forced, and by some means we al<lb n="c56-0012__main__5"/>ways had an end placed in view which <lb n="c56-0012__main__6"/> excited us to ardour.<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in the prosecution of them. It was by this <mdel>&</mdel>method<lb n="c56-0012__main__7"/> not by emulation that we were <lb n="c56-0012__main__8"/> urged. Elizabeth was not told to apply <lb n="c56-0012__main__9"/> herself to drawing <mdel>or</mdel>that her companions <lb n="c56-0012__main__10"/><del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e394__Start"/>would<del n="c56-0012__main__16"/> languages and so far from study <lb n="c56-0012__main__17"/> begin rendered odious <del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e489__Start"/>by<del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e489__End"/> to us th<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rough<lb n="c56-0012__main__18"/> punishment, we loved application <lb n="c56-0012__main__19"/> and our amusements <del not read so many books <lb n="c56-0012__main__22"/> or learn <del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e525__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e525__End"/> languages so quickly <lb n="c56-0012__main__23"/> as <del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e533__Start"/>another child<del loc="c56-0012__main__d1e533__End"/>those who are disciplined according to the ordinarymethod, but what we <lb n="c56-0012__main__24"/> loc="c56-0012__main__d1e622__End"/> school <lb n="c56-0012__main__28"/> with me and generally passed <lb n="c56-0012__main__29"/> the afternoon at our house for<lb n="c56-0013__main__1"/> being an only child, and desti<lb n="c56-0013__main__2"/>tute of companions at home, h<mdel>is</mdel>is<lb n="c56-0013__main__3"/><del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e654__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e654__End"/> father was pleased that he <lb n="c56-0013__main__4"/> should find associates at our <lb n="c56-0013__main__5"/> house and we were never com<lb n="c56-0013__main__6"/>pletely happy when Clerval was <lb n="c56-0013__main__7"/> absent.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0013__main__8"/> In this account of my early <lb n="c56-0013__main__9"/> youth I wish particularly to men<lb n="c56-0013__main__10"/>tion<lb n="c56-0013__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c56-0013__left_margin__d1e690__Start"/>record <del loc="c56-0013__left_margin__d1e690__End"/> those circumstances which <lb n="c56-0013__main__11"/> led to and nourished my taste <lb n="c56-0013__main__12"/> for that science which was <lb n="c56-0013__main__13"/> the principal amusement of my <lb n="c56-0013__main__14"/> boyish days and in the enddeci<lb n="c56-0013__main__15"/>ded my destiny. I mentioned before <lb n="c56-0013__main__16"/> my taste for old books of chemist<lb n="c56-0013__main__17"/>ry and natural magic and I remem<lb n="c56-0013__main__18"/>ber very well that I learned latin <lb n="c56-0013__main__19"/> principally that I might read <lb n="c56-0013__main__20"/> Pliny's Natural History my father <lb n="c56-0013__main__21"/> refusing to allow me to read a <lb n="c56-0013__main__22"/> translation. I used when very young <lb n="c56-0013__main__23"/> to attend lectures of chemistry <lb n="c56-0013__main__24"/> given in Geneva and athough <lb n="c56-0013__main__25"/> I did not understand them the <lb n="c56-0013__main__26"/> experiments never failed to <lb n="c56-0013__main__27"/> attract my attention.<del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e753__Start"/>I reme<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>mber<del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e753__End"/><lb n="c56-0013__main__28"/><del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e764__Start"/>also<del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e764__End"/><gap n="c56-0005__main__2"/> Those events which materially influence our fu<lb n="c56-0005__main__3"/>ture destinies <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e788__Start"/>are<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e788__End"/> often <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e793__Start"/>caused<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e793__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e796__Start"/>by slight or<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e796__End"/>derive thier origin from atri<lb n="c56-0005__main__4"/>vial occurence<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e810__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e810__End"/>. <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e813__Start"/>Strange as the<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e813__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e822__Start"/>statement of the<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e822__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e827__Start"/>simple fact<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e827__End"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__5"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e832__Start"/>may appear my fate had been<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e832__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e835__Start"/>Chemist<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e835__End"/>Natu<lb n="c56-0005__main__6"/>ral philosophy <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e846__Start"/>has<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e846__End"/> is the genius that has <lb n="c56-0005__main__7"/> regulated my fate I <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e853__Start"/>wish<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e853__End"/>desire the<mdel>ir</mdel>refore in this account <lb n="c56-0005__main__8"/> of my early years to state those facts which <lb n="c56-0005__main__9"/> led to my<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e873__Start"/>love<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e873__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e876__Start"/>pursuit<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e876__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e879__Start"/>first aqu<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e879__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e886__Start"/>of that study.<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e886__End"/>predeliction for that science. When <lb n="c56-0005__main__10"/> I was eleven years old we all went on a party <lb n="c56-0005__main__11"/> of pleasure to <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e899__Start"/>Thonon<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e899__End"/>the baths nearThonon.<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e912__Start"/>and were confined there<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e912__End"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__12"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e917__Start"/>b<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e917__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e920__Start"/>obil<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e920__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e923__Start"/>obliged by the rain<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e923__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e926__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e926__End"/><mdel>t</mdel>The inclemen<lb n="c56-0005__main__13"/>cy of the weather obliged us to remain a day <lb n="c56-0005__main__14"/> confined to the inn. In this house I chanced <lb n="c56-0005__main__15"/> to fin<mdel>ed</mdel>d a <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e953__Start"/>fo<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e953__End"/> volume<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e956__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e956__End"/> of the Works of Corne<lb n="c56-0005__main__16"/>lius Agrippa. <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e965__Start"/>And<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e965__End"/> I opened it with apathy <lb n="c56-0005__main__17"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e972__Start"/>but<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e972__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the theory that he attempted to ddemonstrate and the wonderful facts thathe relates <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e986__Start"/>chan<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e986__End"/> soon changed this feeling into<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e990__Start"/>continued to re with<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e990__End"/> enthusiasm. A new <lb n="c56-0005__main__18"/> light dawned upon my mind and <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e999__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e999__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1002__Start"/>com<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1002__End"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__19"/> bounding with joy I communicated my <lb n="c56-0005__main__20"/> discovery to my father. I cannot help here remark <lb n="c56-0005__main__21"/> ing the many opportunities <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1014__Start"/>parents<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1014__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>instructors<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1027__Start"/>have<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1027__End"/>posess<lb n="c56-0005__main__22"/> of directing the attention of their pupils to <lb n="c56-0005__main__23"/> useful knowledge, which they utterly neglect. <lb n="c56-0005__main__24"/> My father looked carelessly at the tit<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1041__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1041__End"/>le page <lb n="c56-0005__main__25"/> of my book — <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1046__Start"/>Ah<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1046__End"/> and said Ah! Cornelius <lb n="c56-0005__main__26"/> Agrippa! — My dear Victor do not waste <lb n="c56-0005__main__27"/> your time upon this – it is sad trash. <lb n="c56-0005__main__28"/> If instead of this remark or rather excla<lb n="c56-0005__main__29"/>mation my father had taken the pains to <lb n="c56-0005__main__30"/>exp<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1068__Start"/>ound<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1068__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>lain to me that the principles of<lb n="c56-0006__main__1"/> Agrippa had been entirely exploded. <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1087__Start"/>And<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1087__End"/><lb n="c56-0006__main__2"/><del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1091__Start"/>aan<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1091__End"/> and that <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1096__Start"/>another<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1096__End"/>a modernsystem of science <lb n="c56-0006__main__3"/> had been introduced which possessed much <lb n="c56-0006__main__4"/> greater power than the ancient because <lb n="c56-0006__main__5"/> the powers of the ancient were pretended <lb n="c56-0006__main__6"/> and chimerical, while those of the moderns <lb n="c56-0006__main__7"/> are real and practical; under such <lb n="c56-0006__main__8"/> circumstances I should certainly have thrown <lb n="c56-0006__main__9"/> Agrippa aside, and with my imagination <lb n="c56-0006__main__10"/> warmed as it was<mdel>w</mdel>should probably have <lb n="c56-0006__main__11"/> aplied myself to <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1129__Start"/>m<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1129__End"/> the more <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1132__Start"/>ra<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1132__End"/> rational <lb n="c56-0006__main__12"/> theory of chemistry which <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1138__Start"/>has at present<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1138__End"/>has resulted from modern discoveries<lb n="c56-0006__main__13"/><del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1145__Start"/>the approbation of the learned.<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1145__End"/>It is even possible that the train of my ideas might never have recievedthat fatal impulse which led me to my ruin. But the <lb n="c56-0006__main__14"/> cursory glance my father had taken of <lb n="c56-0006__main__15"/> my volume by no means assured me <lb n="c56-0006__main__16"/> that he was acquainted with <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1164__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1164__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>its contents; <lb n="c56-0006__main__17"/> and I continued to read with the greatest <lb n="c56-0006__main__18"/> avidity. <milestone unit="tei:p"/><metamark function="paragraph">[</metamark>When I returned home, my first <lb n="c56-0006__main__19"/> care was to procure <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1188__Start"/>this<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1188__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>whole works of this <lb n="c56-0006__main__20"/> author and afterwards those of Paracel<lb n="c56-0006__main__21"/>sus and Albertus Magnus. I read and studied<lb n="c56-0006__main__22"/> the wild fancies of these authors with <lb n="c56-0006__main__23"/> delight, they appeared to me treasures <lb n="c56-0006__main__24"/> known to few besides myself; and, although<lb n="c56-0006__main__25"/> I often wished to <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1238__Start"/>discover<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1238__End"/>communicate these secret stores <lb n="c56-0006__main__26"/> of knowledge <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1248__Start"/>from<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1248__End"/> to my father yet his in<lb n="c56-0007__main__1"/>definite censure of my favorite Agrippa, <lb n="c56-0007__main__2"/> always withheld me. <del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1264__Start"/>I let<del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1264__End"/> I disclosed my secret <lb n="c56-0007__main__3"/> to Elizabeth therefore, under a strict promise <lb n="c56-0007__main__4"/> of secrecy; but she did not interest herself <lb n="c56-0007__main__5"/> in <del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1276__Start"/>them<del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1276__End"/><mdel>my</mdel>the subject, and I was left by her to pursue <lb n="c56-0007__main__6"/> my studies alone. –<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0007__main__7"/> It may appear very strange that a desci<lb n="c56-0007__main__8"/>ple of Albertus Magnus should arise in the <lb n="c56-0007__main__9"/> eighteenth century, but our family was not <lb n="c56-0007__main__10"/> scientifical, and I <del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1308__Start"/>did<del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1308__End"/>had not attended any of the <lb n="c56-0007__main__11"/> lectures given at Geneva. My dreams were <lb n="c56-0007__main__12"/> therefore undisturbed by reality, and I entered <lb n="c56-0007__main__13"/> with the greates diligence into the search <lb n="c56-0007__main__14"/> of the philosophers stone and the <note> or if you chose petrum philosophale </note><del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1332__Start"/>elizer vi<del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1332__End"/>elixer of life<lb n="c56-0007__main__15"/><del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1339__Start"/>tæ<del loc="c56-0007__main__d1e1339__End"/>. They admired the beauty <lb n="c56-0015__main__4"/> of the storm without wishing to <lb n="c56-0015__main__5"/> analyze its causes. Henry said that <lb n="c56-0015__main__6"/> the Fairies and giants were at <lb n="c56-0015__main__7"/> war and Elizabeth attempted <lb n="c56-0015__main__8"/> a picture of it.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0015__main__9"/> As I grew older my attempts <lb n="c56-0015__main__10"/> in science were of a higher nature. <lb n="c56-0015__main__11"/> I <del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2062__Start"/>endeavou<del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2062__End"/> produced little earthquakes <lb n="c56-0015__main__12"/> and tried every kind of combination <lb n="c56-0015__main__13"/> of gasses <del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2070__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2070__End"/> and elements to ascertain <lb n="c56-0015__main__14"/> the results.<gap quantity="16" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><gap quantity="3" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0009__main__1"/><mdel>An</mdel><mdel>d</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>Among other questions suggested by natural objects I <del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2101__Start"/>as<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2101__End"/> eagerly enquired of my father <lb n="c56-0009__main__2"/><del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2107__Start"/>what<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2107__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the nature & the origin of thunder and lightening. <del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2119__Start"/>was.<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2119__End"/> He <lb n="c56-0009__main__3"/> replied, electricity; describing at the same <lb n="c56-0009__main__4"/> time the effect of that power. He <del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2128__Start"/>made<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2128__End"/>constructed<lb n="c56-0009__main__5"/> a small electrical machine and exhi<lb n="c56-0009__main__6"/>bited a few experiments and made a <lb n="c56-0009__main__7"/> kite with a wire & string <del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2151__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2151__End"/>which drew down <lb n="c56-0009__main__8"/> that fluid from the clouds.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0009__main__9"/> This last <del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2165__Start"/>blow<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2165__End"/><del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2168__Start"/>st<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2168__End"/> stroke compleated <lb n="c56-0009__main__10"/> the overthrow of Cornelius Agrippa, Albertus <lb n="c56-0009__main__11"/> Magnus and Paracelsus, who had so long <lb n="c56-0009__main__12"/> reigned the lords of my imagination. But <lb n="c56-0009__main__13"/> by some fatality I did not feel enclined to <lb n="c56-0009__main__14"/> commence any modern system and this <lb n="c56-0009__main__15"/><del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2185__Start"/>inclination<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2185__End"/>disinclination was influenced by the following <lb n="c56-0009__main__16"/> circumstance.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0009__main__17"/> My father expressed a wish that I <lb n="c56-0009__main__18"/> should attend a course of lectures upon <lb n="c56-0009__main__19"/> natural philosophy, to which I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>cheerfullyconsented and <lb n="c56-0009__main__20"/>one evening that I spent in town at the <lb n="c56-0009__main__21"/> house of Clerval's father I heard that <lb n="c56-0009__main__22"/> Mr — was lef at met M. <del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2233__Start"/>O P<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2233__End"/> a proficient <lb n="c56-0009__main__23"/> in Chemistry who left the company at <lb n="c56-0009__main__24"/> an early hour to <del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2240__Start"/>h<del loc="c56-0009__main__d1e2240__End"/> give his lecture upon <lb n="c56-0009__main__25"/>tha<mdel>n</mdel>t science enquiring as he went out<lb n="c56-0010__main__1"/><del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2264__Start"/>if any one would him I went<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2264__End"/><del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2272__Start"/>but<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2272__End"/>Some accident prevented my attending the <del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2276__Start"/>series of<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2276__End"/> these lectures<lb n="c56-0010__main__2"/><del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2281__Start"/>this lecture was unfortunately nearly the<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2281__End"/>until <del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2286__Start"/>they were nearly over <del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2286__End"/><del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2289__Start"/>they<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2289__End"/> it was nearly finihsed. loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2393__End"/><mdel>ar</mdel><mdel>of</mdel><lb n="c56-0010__main__15"/> in my estimation of nearly equal interest & utility.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0010__main__16"/> My <del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2415__Start"/>studies<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2415__End"/>occupations at this age were <del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2422__Start"/>th<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2422__End"/> principally the <lb n="c56-0010__main__17"/> mathematics, <del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2427__Start"/>which I delighted in an<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2427__End"/> and most <lb n="c56-0010__main__18"/> of the branches of study appertaining <del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2432__Start"/>th<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2432__End"/> to that <lb n="c56-0010__main__19"/> science. I was also busily employed in learning <lb n="c56-0010__main__20"/> languages Latin was <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>already familiar to me and I began to <lb n="c56-0010__main__21"/> read without the help of the <del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2454__Start"/>dictionary<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2454__End"/>lexicon some of the <lb n="c56-0010__main__22"/> easiest greek authors. –I also understood English&<lb n="c56-0010__main__23"/> german perfectly: th<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2470__Start"/>ese<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2470__End"/>is<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2475__Start"/>are<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2475__End"/>is list of my accom<lb n="c56-0010__main__24"/>plishments at <del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2491__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2491__End"/><del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2494__Start"/>time<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2494__End"/><mdel>th</mdel><del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2500__Start"/>e period<del loc="c56-0010__main__d1e2500__End"/> the age of and you may <lb n="c56-0010__main__25"/> conceive that my hours were fully employd <lb n="c56-0010__main__26"/> in acquiring and maintaining a knowledge <lb n="c56-0010__main__27"/> of this various literature.<gap quantity="14" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0015__main__1"/>As I before mentioned my brothers <lb n="c56-0015__main__2"/> were much younger than myself. <lb n="c56-0015__main__3"/> Ernest the second of our family was five<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0015__main__4"/> Another task <del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2533__Start"/>soon<del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2533__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>also devolved upon <lb n="c56-0015__main__5"/> me when I became the instructor <lb n="c56-0015__main__6"/> of my brothers. Ernest was five years <lb n="c56-0015__main__7"/> younger than myself, and was my <lb n="c56-0015__main__8"/> principal pupil. He had been aflicted <lb n="c56-0015__main__9"/> with ill health from his infancy <mdel>&</mdel>thro which<lb n="c56-0015__main__10"/> Elizabeth and I had been his constant <lb n="c56-0015__main__11"/><del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2567__Start"/>m<del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2567__End"/> nurses <del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2571__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2571__End"/> his disposition was gentle but <lb n="c56-0015__main__12"/> he was incapable any severe appli<lb n="c56-0015__main__13"/>cation. William the younge<mdel>er</mdel>st of our <lb n="c56-0015__main__14"/> family was quite a child and the <lb n="c56-0015__main__15"/> most beautiful little fellow in the <lb n="c56-0015__main__16"/> world, his lively blue eyes dimpled cheeks<lb n="c56-0016__main__1"/> and <del loc="c56-0016__main__d1e2605__Start"/>affectionate<del loc="c56-0016__main__d1e2605__End"/> endearing manners <lb n="c56-0016__main__2"/> inspired the tenderest affection. Such <lb n="c56-0016__main__3"/> was our domestic circle from which <lb n="c56-0016__main__4"/> care and pain seemed for ever banish<lb n="c56-0016__main__5"/>ed. <del loc="c56-0016__main__d1e2621__Start"/>f<del loc="c56-0016__main__d1e2621__End"/> My father directed our studies <lb n="c56-0016__main__6"/> and my mother partook of our <lb n="c56-0016__main__7"/> enjoyments. <del loc="c56-0016__main__d1e2631__Start"/>we were all equal<del loc="c56-0016__main__d1e2631__End"/><lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c56-0016__left_margin__d1e2641__Start"/>we none<del loc="c56-0016__left_margin__d1e2641__End"/>neither of <lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__2"/> us possessed <lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__3"/> an envied <lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__4"/> preheminence <lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__5"/> over the other the <lb n="c56-0016__main__8"/> voice of command was never heard <lb n="c56-0016__main__9"/> among us but mutual affection <lb n="c56-0016__main__10"/> engaged us all to comply with,&to<lb n="c56-0016__main__11"/> obey the slightest desire of each <lb n="c56-0016__main__12"/> other.
